description: This file defines a Redux slice for authentication management using Redux Toolkit. It includes async thunks for login, registration, fetching current user, updating profile, changing password, and logout, along with slice reducers handling state updates based on these actions.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Async thunk to handle user login using provided credentials.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Async thunk to handle user registration.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Async thunk to fetch current user data.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Async thunk to update user's profile.

methods.name: changePassword
methods.description: Async thunk to change user's password.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Async thunk to log out the user.
